about_the_game:
Step into the role of an ostrich farm owner, where your goal is to breed the most striking ostriches. It's more than just about looks; smart strategies, good timing, and a little bit of luck will take your business to a whole new level.

Key Features

  • Breed Colorful Ostriches: Selectively breed a multitude of extravagant ostriches.
  • Fulfill Orders: Your birds are in high demand! Deliver the requested ostriches to earn rewards.
  • Unlock Rare Variations: Discover rare mutations in the form of over 1 million unique combinations of colors, patterns, beak shapes and hairstyles.
  • Watch Your Ostriches Interact: Observe delightful mating dances and social behaviors.
  • Expand Your Farm: Expand your farm to provide more space for your growing ostrich population.
  • Collect Achievements: Challenge yourself and accomplish various milestones to collect achievements that reflect your expertise as a skilled ostrich breeder.

Social Behavior

Observe charming dances when your ostriches try to impress each other.

Baby Steps

Witness the first steps of your baby ostriches. Every hatchling brings a fresh wave of excitement and potential.

Unlock Rewards

Use rewards to enhance your breeding strategies and boost your farm's productivity.

Step into the role of an ostrich farm owner, where your goal is to breed the most striking ostriches. It's more than just about looks; smart strategies, good timing, and a little bit of luck will take your business to a whole new level.

  • Breed Colorful Ostriches: Selectively breed a multitude of extravagant ostriches.

  • Watch Your Ostriches Interact: Observe delightful mating dances and social behaviors.
  • Expand Your Farm: Expand your farm to provide more space for your growing ostrich population.

name: Ostrich Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core, 1.9 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 590 series card or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 series card or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Sunshine graces the farm and your birds are a fashion disaster. Breed vibrant ostriches and complete orders by producing the requested colors and patterns. Earn valuable rewards and enhance your farm's genetic diversity. 🌈🥚🐥
